title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing a lightweight, extensible framework for running large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client library for interacting with the Ollama API from Node.js or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library that wraps the Ollama REST API for easy LLM inference in Python scripts.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package allowing Ollama models to be used as LLMs or chat models inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama featuring model management, chat history, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java client library for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs for Java/Kotlin projects.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Simple command-line utility for interacting with Ollama models directly from the terminal with prompt templates.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-curated recipes and examples showing how to integrate Ollama with various frameworks and tools.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model through slash commands in Discord servers.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Experimental repository demonstrating how to expose custom Python functions as tools for Ollama models.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with .NET MAUI allowing point-and-click model management.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app bootstrapped with Vite that connects to a local Ollama instance for chatting.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that enables using Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store and Streamlit frontend.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot written in Go that answers channel mentions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node that integrates Ollama models into no-code workflows for automation tasks.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds a sidebar chat powered by a local Ollama instance for coding assistance.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters with GPU support.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module that wraps Ollama so CI pipelines can spin up ephemeral LLM services for testing.
